properties.Title: Sherpur
properties.Story: Meet Gaziur and her two children.  She has been hired to care for trees planted in a new nursery formed to grow saplings for roadside tree plantations.  This income will provide food and money to help educate her children, beginning their lift out of poverty.
properties.Summary: Tree nursery and roadside plantation in Sherpur, Bogra

properties.Title: Nikli
properties.Story: Education IS the key to lift someone out of poverty.  We support 40 schools in all areas we serve in Bangladesh, with an average of 30 Kindergarten, 1st and 2nd grade students in each school.  Children, like those pictured in our school in Nikli, Kishoreganj, are eager to learn.

properties.Title: Mendni
properties.Story: Women are empowered when given a skill and ability to earn income for their family.  When women are empowered, the family benefits through improved nutrition, education for the children and the development of assets to continue their uplift out of extreme poverty.
properties.Summary: Two Small Garment Factories in the Nari and Medni areas in the Netrokona district
